sentence.Network_en: Inflate the Executive Punching Bag ( wonderfullywacky. com ) and pummel " the boss " as needed.
sentence.Network_cn: 按你的上司形象做一个充气吊袋,在你郁闷的时候揍它 ( 他 ).

sentence.Network_en: I am dying for a chance to pummel that guy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很想要有一个机会打那家伙.

sentence.Network_en: On Jan. 10, blizzards started to pummel a huge swath of central and southern China.
sentence.Network_cn: 到了1月10日, 暴风雪开始席卷华中和华南地区.

list.abs: Its aircraft already pummelled almost every target in Gaza ., 以色列战机已经袭击数次几乎加沙的每一个目标.

but in just the past few weeks , as the credit crisis pummeled the financial system , economic data have become steadily worse , raising fears of a recession .但就在过去几周里，随着信贷危机重创金融体系，经济数据不断恶化，对衰退的担忧开始加剧。
floods , landslides and mudslides have pummeled several southwestern regions .洪水、山体滑坡和泥石流袭击了西南地区几个村庄。
the U.S. capital is bracing for a second major snow storm just days after a powerful blizzard pummeled the region with snowfalls up to 90 centimeters .美国首都华盛顿将再降大雪；就在几天前，该地区遭遇了强烈暴风雪袭击，降雪量高达90厘米。

entry.tran: 连续猛击；反复拳打；捶打
entry.def: If you pummel someone or something, you hit them many times using your fists.

example.ex: He trapped Conn in a corner and pummeled him ferociously for thirty seconds.
example.tran: 他将康恩逼进一个角落，用拳头暴打了他半分钟。

auth_sentence.content: She picked up a cushion, to pummel it...into shape.
auth_sentence.res_content: She picked up a cushion, to pummel it...into shape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She picked up a cushion, to pummel it...into shape.

auth_sentence.content: We had to make a snowman, just so that we could pummel him.
auth_sentence.res_content: We had to make a snowman, just so that we could pummel him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We had to make a snowman, just so that we could pummel him.

auth_sentence.content: You can always pick them up and pummel the crap out of them any time you want.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can always pick them up and pummel the crap out of them any time you want.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can always pick them up and pummel the crap out of them any time you want.

sentences.en: The thief was pushed and pummeled by an angry crowd.
sentences.cn: 一群人推搡并痛打小偷。
